statements: SELECT * FROM HydrationMonitor;
SELECT person_id, hydration_level FROM HydrationMonitor;
SELECT person_id, intake_frequency FROM HydrationMonitor WHERE hydration_level > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM HydrationMonitor WHERE intake_frequency < 3;
SELECT * FROM HydrationMonitor ORDER BY hydration_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM HydrationMonitor ORDER BY hydration_level DESC, person_id ASC;
SELECT person_id, hydration_level FROM HydrationMonitor WHERE hydration_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM HydrationMonitor WHERE intake_frequency BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY person_id;
SELECT person_id, AVG(hydration_level) AS avg_hydration FROM HydrationMonitor GROUP BY person_id HAVING avg_hydration > 0.6;
SELECT person_id, SUM(intake_frequency) AS total_intake FROM HydrationMonitor GROUP BY person_id ORDER BY total_intake DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hydration_Levels;
SELECT user_id, hydration_level FROM Hydration_Levels WHERE hydration_level > 2.5;
SELECT user_id, last_updated, hydration_level FROM Hydration_Levels ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM Intake_Frequency WHERE intake_count >= 3;
SELECT user_id, last_intake FROM Intake_Frequency WHERE last_intake BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Hydration_Levels WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, hydration_level FROM Hydration_Levels ORDER BY hydration_level DESC, last_updated ASC;
SELECT user_id, intake_count, last_intake FROM Intake_Frequency WHERE intake_count > 10 ORDER BY last_intake DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hydration_Levels INNER JOIN Intake_Frequency ON Hydration_Levels.user_id = Intake_Frequency.user_id;
SELECT user_id, hydration_level, last_updated FROM Hydration_Levels WHERE hydration_level > 0.5 AND last_updated >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT * FROM user_details;
SELECT username, age FROM user_details WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, hydration_level FROM hydration_levels ORDER BY hydration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM intake_frequency WHERE water_intake > 8 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT username, weight FROM user_details WHERE weight BETWEEN 50 AND 70;
SELECT username, age FROM user_details WHERE weight > 70 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM hydration_levels WHERE hydration_level >= 5 AND hydration_date > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY hydration_level ASC

SELECT u.username, h.hydration_level, i.water_intake FROM user_details u JOIN hydration_levels h ON u.user_id = h.user_id JOIN intake_frequency i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE h.hydration_level > i.water_intake AND i.daily_frequency >= 3 ORDER BY u.username
SELECT * FROM user_details WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC, weight ASC
SELECT u.username, h.hydration_level FROM user_details u LEFT JOIN hydration_levels h ON u.user_id = h.user_id WHERE h.hydration_level IS NULL OR h.hydration_level < 3 ORDER BY u.username
SELECT * FROM hydration_levels;
SELECT user_id, hydration_level FROM hydration_levels WHERE hydration_level > 50;
SELECT user_id, hydration_level, timestamp FROM hydration_levels ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(intake_amount) AS total_intakes FROM hydration_intake GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, daily_goal FROM hydration_goals WHERE daily_goal < 2000;
SELECT * FROM hydration_levels WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, hydration_level FROM hydration_levels WHERE hydration_level > 50 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(intake_amount) AS total_intake FROM hydration_intake GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_intake > 1000;

SELECT user_id, daily_goal, intake_amount, intake_time FROM hydration_goals JOIN hydration_history ON hydration_goals.user_id = hydration_history.user_id WHERE intake_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM hydration_levels hl JOIN hydration_intake hi ON hl.user_id = hi.user_id ORDER BY hl.timestamp DESC, hi.intake_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, hydration_level, measurement_datetime FROM hydration_levels ORDER BY measurement_datetime DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount_ml, intake_datetime FROM water_intake WHERE amount_ml > 500 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, goal_amount_ml, start_date, end_date FROM hydration_goals WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user
SELECT username, email FROM users
SELECT id, goal_amount_ml FROM hydration_goals WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT amount_ml, log_datetime FROM intake_logs ORDER BY log_datetime DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount_ml) AS total_intake FROM water_intake GROUP BY user_id
